parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must ensure that it is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

> By default, the system checks whether auto-renewal is enabled for all instances.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30**, **50**, and **100**.

> The default value is **30**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance.
